verses.verse: I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H376><s%> a man with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Then I asked, <S%H559><s%> "Where are you going? <S%H1980><s%>" He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H4058><s%> "To measure Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is its breadth <S%H7341><s%> and what is its length. <S%H753><s%>"
Behold, <S%H4397><s%> the angel who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet him, <S%H7125><s%>

and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7323><s%> "Run, speak <S%H1696><s%> to this <S%H1975><s%> young man, <S%H5288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3389><s%> 'Jerusalem will be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as villages without walls, <S%H6519><s%> because of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and livestock <S%H929><s%> in it. <S%H8432><s%>

For I, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2346><s%> 'will be to her a wall of fire <S%H784><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H3519><s%> and I will be the glory in the midst of her. <S%H8432><s%>

Come! <S%H1945><s%> Come! <S%H1945><s%> Flee <S%H5127><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> <S%H6566><s%> 'for I have spread you abroad as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
<S%H1945><s%> 'Come, Zion! <S%H6726><s%> Escape, <S%H4422><s%> you who dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>'

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> <S%H310><s%> 'For honor <S%H3519><s%> he has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to the nations <S%H1471><s%> which plundered <S%H7997><s%> you; <S%H5060><s%> for he who touches you touches <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye. <S%H5869><s%>

For, <S%H5130><s%> behold, I will shake my hand <S%H3027><s%> over them, <S%H7998><s%> and they will be a spoil to those who served <S%H5647><s%> them; <S%H3045><s%> and you will know that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has sent me. <S%H7971><s%>

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> for, <S%H935><s%> behold, I come, and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall join <S%H3867><s%> themselves to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and shall be my people; <S%H5971><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> has sent me to you. <S%H7971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will inherit <S%H5157><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> as his portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and will again choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Be silent, <S%H2013><s%> all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for he has roused <S%H5782><s%> himself from his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation! <S%H4583><s%>"
